bug.author: lcax200000
bug.summary: Jupyter Spawned failed when notebook images upgrade to v0.5.0
bug.description: Jupyter Spawned failed when notebook images upgrade to gcr.io/kubeflow-images-public/tensorflow-1.10.1-notebook-cpu:v0.5.0 gcr.io/kubeflow-images-public/tensorflow-1.10.1-notebook-cpu:v0.3.1 and gcr.io/kubeflow-images-public/tensorflow-1.10.1-notebook-cpu:v0.4.0 is still successed [root@k8s-m1 mnist]# kubectl logs -f jupyter-c6 -n kubeflow [FATAL tini (6)] exec start-singleuser.sh failed: No such file or directory
